name: Sunset
headline: Find and move money after a death
description: Sunset can track down bank accounts, retirement accounts, investment accounts, property and more for families after losing a loved one. Sunset will close those accounts and move the money into a Sunset estate account to manage.

founders.name: Kaela Worthen, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder of Sunset, finding and moving funds after you lose a loved one. Previously cofounded Paintbrush, Imzy, worked at Podium, Reddit. Mostly a product person with some engineering, UX, data science, and a bit everything else mixed in.

raw_markdown='Sunset | Find and secure money after a death

Announcing Same-Day Financial Discovery
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/671ebfc06a9ff0cd1eebaefa_Sunset%20Navy%20Logo%20500w.png)](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</>)

# Find & secure money after a death
![Investors Images](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f382_Investor%20Images.webp)
Over 1,000+ families have used Sunset to discover financial accounts for a loved one.
[Get Started](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/find.sunsetapp.com/>)
![Sunset estate software financial accounts discovery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/661d8d6655f389578eb7d43b_financial%20accounts%20\(1\)%20cropped.png)![Sunset Estate Discovery Automation Apple Android](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/66882fdd75c1cce8532975a5_floating%20accounts.png)
Automation not complication
## You just lost a loved one, now what?
‍Let Sunset identify bank accounts, stocks, bonds, investment accounts, retirement accounts, real estate, and any other assets for free.When you are ready, Sunset can consolidate those accounts into an estate account you control.
[Learn More](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</how-it-works>)
Financial Wizardry
### Discover Accounts
Sunset automatically finds all financial assets of the deceased **without notifying t** he banks and insurance companies.
[Financial Discovery](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</financial-discovery>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/67097a787f86a2c8e872993b_Banks.png)
#### Financial Institutions
Sunset connects to banks, credit unions, retirement accounts, and more. 
[Learn More](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</financial-discovery>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/67097fa2358cf573caadca08_Insurance.png)
#### Life Insurance
Sunset works directly with insurance companies on behalf of the family to discovery life insurance and funeral insurance policies.
[Learn More](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</discover-life-insurance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/67097fa2154af37740a48de9_Credit%20Cards.png)
#### Credit Cards
Sunset finds all credit card accounts for the deceased, personal loans, mortgages, and other financial obligations.
[Learn More](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</discover-credit-cards>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/67097fa284528ac4e26d44b4_Property%20%26%20Vehicles.png)
#### Property & Vehicles
Sunset automatically searches for any property records associated with the deceased. 
[Learn More](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</discover-property-vehicles>)
Account CLosure Control
## Move Money
Sunset works with financial institutions to get the money for you and consolidate it into a single account. With Sunset, **you control the process** and timing of notifying the financial institutions.
[![Sunset estate app 100 estate settlement tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/6611bd93609bdb50cef697c0_8666666_check_square_icon.png)Checking Accounts](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</bank-account-discovery>)[![Sunset estate app 100 estate settlement tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/6611bd93609bdb50cef697c0_8666666_check_square_icon.png)Savings Accounts](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</bank-account-discovery>)[![Sunset estate app 100 estate settlement tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/6611bd93609bdb50cef697c0_8666666_check_square_icon.png)Life Insurance](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</discover-life-insurance>)
[![Sunset estate app 100 estate settlement tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/6611bd93609bdb50cef697c0_8666666_check_square_icon.png)Real Property](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</discover-property-vehicles>)[![Sunset estate app 100 estate settlement tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/6611bd93609bdb50cef697c0_8666666_check_square_icon.png)Retirement Accounts](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</discover-retirement-accounts>)[![Sunset estate app 100 estate settlement tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/6611bd93609bdb50cef697c0_8666666_check_square_icon.png)Investment Accounts](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</discover-investment-accounts>)
[Learn How It Works](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</how-it-works>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/670acbd53e164165fc506db3_Free%20MacBook%20Pro%20mockup%20on%20a%20table%20with%20a%20plant%20in%20the%20background%20\(Mockuuups%20Studio\).png)
## Customer Reviews

![Kelly Conor Sunset estate app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/660c9ed981e9a5dfc1928793_kelly%20connor%20100.jpg)
Kelly Connor
Alexandria, VA

Pasadena, CA
![Sunset integration partner chase bank](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e39524a1790d3748574fe5_Chase_Bank-Logo.wine.png)![State Farm logo sunset estate settlement integration app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e6559150d9e9796974f899_State-Farm-Logo-768x432.png)![Northwestern Mutual Sunset integration estate settlement](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e65736a5b3f960c0929342_Northeastern-Mutual-Logo-768x432.png)![Wells Fargo sunset integration estate settlement](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e65631d685f8a972e5d740_Wells-Fargo-Logo-768x432.png)![New York Life logo sunset estate settlement integration app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e6907b660cc894893fdc9f_New_York_Life_logo_PNG1.png)![Merrill Lynch sunset integration estate settlement](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e6577cd2c700feb1994814_Merrill-Lynch-logo-768x432.png)
Direct Integrations
### Our Trusted Partners
Sunset has integrations and partnerships with every major bank, credit bureau, investment platform, retirement account manager, insurance company, and financial institution of any kind in the United States.
[Integration Partners](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</integration-partners>)
## Frequently asked questions
We have put together some commonly asked questions
How much does Sunset cost?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Sunset's deceased asset search and closure is free to use.After you select bank accounts, retirement account, etc. to close, we will move those accounts and money into a investment account managed by Sunset and controlled by you.Sunset earns a fee on interest generated while money sits in the estate account.
How does Sunset work?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Sunset is a financial software tool that finds the accounts and assets of a loved one after a death. No bank, insurance company, retirement fund, etc. is notified of the search. After the search is complete, you can control which assets are closed and moved into a Sunset estate account. Families can decide which accounts are closed, and when they are closed.‍After an account is closed the money is transferred to a Sunset estate account which you control, to consolidate and invest.
Is the process secure and compliant with privacy laws?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Yes, Sunset employs robust security measures to protect user data. All personal data is stored in a SOC 2 certified database, and financial account connections are compliant with ISO 27001, ISO 27701, and SSAE18 SOC 2. 
How does Sunset handle debts and liabilities of the estate?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Sunset helps users identify outstanding debts and liabilities of the estate including credit cards balances, mortgages, property taxes, personal loans, etc.Creditors are not notified by Sunset of a death.Families can decide which debts are paid, and when.
What if there is an account I _don't_ want to close?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
After Sunset completes its search, you can select accounts that you do not want to be closed by Sunset. If the situation changes you can change that account's setting and Sunset will close it later.
Does Sunset generate legal documents such as wills and trusts?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
No, Sunset only helps to settle an estate after the death has occurred. There are many great websites and law firms to help with preparation and planning.
What types of assets can Sunset discover?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Sunset can discover and close a wide range of assets, including insurance, bank accounts, retirement accounts and more. We can also handle property, vehicles and personal belongings. If you have something specific and you'd like to double check, our support line is always open.
What happens if there are disputes among beneficiaries?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Sunset can help settle disputes among family and heirs by providing a clear financial picture of the estate assets.
Can Sunset handle complex estates with multiple properties and investments?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Yes, Sunset is designed to handle estates of varying complexities, including those with multiple properties, investments, and accounts. 
Can Sunset find money for me?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Yes, Sunset will help find any accounts you didn't know existed, including bank accounts, retirement accounts, and more.
Is there customer support available to assist with any issues?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Yes, our customer support team is available to assist users with any questions or issues they may encounter during the estate settlement process, over messaging, phone, or email.
How far back can Sunset search?
![Arrow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b3_accordion%20arrow.svg)
Our software works best for people who have recently passed, however we can support people who died up to seven years prior. If you are working on a death prior to that, please contact our support team to see if we can help.
Couldn’t find what you were looking for? Write to us at support@sunsetapp.com
## Discover accounts now
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b2_text%20arrow.svg)
It takes less that 2 minutes to get started.
[Get Started](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/find.sunsetapp.com/>)
[![Sunset estate software financial accounts discovery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/661d8d6655f389578eb7d43b_financial%20accounts%20\(1\)%20cropped.png)](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/find.sunsetapp.com/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/668c18963483eebd061a18fd_pale%20cream%20logo.png)](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</>)
[](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61556998235325>)[](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/twitter.com/SunsetEstateApp>)[](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/sunsetestateapp>)

COMPANY Info
[Partnerships](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</partnerships>)[Blog](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</blog>)[Terms of Use](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</terms-of-use>)[Privacy Policy](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</privacy-policy>)[Electronic Communications Policy](https://www.sunsetapp.com/</electronic-communications-policy>)
Thank you for visiting our website. If you’ve lost a friend or family member, we hope our tool provides some assistance during this difficult time.‍
We are **Sunset Software, Inc.** , a company specializing in software designed to help locate accounts and assets after a loss. While we strive to identify every asset and account associated with the deceased, we cannot guarantee the accuracy or completeness of our results. In some cases, assets may not be found, or results may contain inaccuracies.
**Sunset Advisory, LLC** , a wholly owned subsidiary of Sunset Software, Inc., is a registered investment adviser with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Sunset Advisory, LLC focuses on closing and consolidating accounts of the deceased and conservatively investing assets until the estate closure process is complete.
Registration with the SEC does not imply a certain level of skill or training but requires compliance with federal regulations designed to protect investors. By law, we are obligated to provide investment advice in the best interest of our clients. Please refer to[ Sunset Advisory, LLC’s Form CRS](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/reports.adviserinfo.sec.gov/crs/crs_334116.pdf>) for additional important information, or review [Sunset Advisory, LLC through FINRA’s BrokerCheck.](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/brokercheck.finra.org/>)
Estate accounts are held as brokerage accounts, and while our proprietary software is designed to facilitate efficient estate account management with a focus on low risk, all investment accounts carry inherent risks.
By using this website or our software, you acknowledge that the information provided is for informational purposes only and agree to our [Terms of Use](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/www.sunsetapp.com/terms-of-use>) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.sunsetapp.com/<https:/www.sunsetapp.com/privacy-policy>).
© 2025 Sunset Software, Inc. All rights reserved.
‍

How much does Sunset cost?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Sunset's deceased asset search and closure is free to use.After you select bank accounts, retirement account, etc. to close, we will move those accounts and money into a investment account managed by Sunset and controlled by you.Sunset earns a fee on interest generated while money sits in the estate account.
How does Sunset work?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Sunset is a financial software tool that finds the accounts and assets of a loved one after a death. No bank, insurance company, retirement fund, etc. is notified of the search. After the search is complete, you can control which assets are closed and moved into a Sunset estate account. Families can decide which accounts are closed, and when they are closed.‍After an account is closed the money is transferred to a Sunset estate account which you control, to consolidate and invest.
Is the process secure and compliant with privacy laws?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Yes, Sunset employs robust security measures to protect user data. All personal data is stored in a SOC 2 certified database, and financial account connections are compliant with ISO 27001, ISO 27701, and SSAE18 SOC 2. 
How does Sunset handle debts and liabilities of the estate?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Sunset helps users identify outstanding debts and liabilities of the estate including credit cards balances, mortgages, property taxes, personal loans, etc.Creditors are not notified by Sunset of a death.Families can decide which debts are paid, and when.
What if there is an account I _don't_ want to close?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
After Sunset completes its search, you can select accounts that you do not want to be closed by Sunset. If the situation changes you can change that account's setting and Sunset will close it later.
Does Sunset generate legal documents such as wills and trusts?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
No, Sunset only helps to settle an estate after the death has occurred. There are many great websites and law firms to help with preparation and planning.
What types of assets can Sunset discover?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Sunset can discover and close a wide range of assets, including insurance, bank accounts, retirement accounts and more. We can also handle property, vehicles and personal belongings. If you have something specific and you'd like to double check, our support line is always open.
What happens if there are disputes among beneficiaries?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Sunset can help settle disputes among family and heirs by providing a clear financial picture of the estate assets.
Can Sunset handle complex estates with multiple properties and investments?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Yes, Sunset is designed to handle estates of varying complexities, including those with multiple properties, investments, and accounts. 
Can Sunset find money for me?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Yes, Sunset will help find any accounts you didn't know existed, including bank accounts, retirement accounts, and more.
Is there customer support available to assist with any issues?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Yes, our customer support team is available to assist users with any questions or issues they may encounter during the estate settlement process, over messaging, phone, or email.
How far back can Sunset search?
![Arrow ⟨34⟩]
Our software works best for people who have recently passed, however we can support people who died up to seven years prior. If you are working on a death prior to that, please contact our support team to see if we can help.
Couldn’t find what you were looking for? Write to us at support@sunsetapp.com
## Discover accounts now
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e21d8d051ae3045170f2ff/65e21d8d051ae3045170f3b2_text%20arrow.svg)
It takes less that 2 minutes to get started.
Get Started⟨15⟩

Thank you for visiting our website. If you’ve lost a friend or family member, we hope our tool provides some assistance during this difficult time.‍
We are **Sunset Software, Inc.** , a company specializing in software designed to help locate accounts and assets after a loss. While we strive to identify every asset and account associated with the deceased, we cannot guarantee the accuracy or completeness of our results. In some cases, assets may not be found, or results may contain inaccuracies.
**Sunset Advisory, LLC** , a wholly owned subsidiary of Sunset Software, Inc., is a registered investment adviser with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Sunset Advisory, LLC focuses on closing and consolidating accounts of the deceased and conservatively investing assets until the estate closure process is complete.
Registration with the SEC does not imply a certain level of skill or training but requires compliance with federal regulations designed to protect investors. By law, we are obligated to provide investment advice in the best interest of our clients. Please refer to Sunset Advisory, LLC’s Form CRS⟨42⟩ for additional important information, or review Sunset Advisory, LLC through FINRA’s BrokerCheck.⟨43⟩
Estate accounts are held as brokerage accounts, and while our proprietary software is designed to facilitate efficient estate account management with a focus on low risk, all investment accounts carry inherent risks.
By using this website or our software, you acknowledge that the information provided is for informational purposes only and agree to our Terms of Use⟨44⟩ and Privacy Policy⟨45⟩.
© 2025 Sunset Software, Inc. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
**Sunset Overview**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, Sunset is a fintech company with a mission to help families find and manage the financial assets of loved ones after they pass away. With a small team of just two employees, and under the guidance of group partner Dalton Caldwell, Sunset is making strides in the consumer finance space.

**What Sunset Does**

Sunset offers a unique software tool that simplifies the often-overwhelming process of asset discovery and management during a time of grief. The platform helps identify various financial accounts—including bank, retirement, and investment accounts, as well as properties and vehicles—without triggering any notifications to the relevant institutions. Once all assets are discovered, Sunset assists in closing these accounts and consolidating the funds into a managed estate account.

Here’s how it works:
1. **Financial Discovery**: Sunset automatically identifies assets tied to the deceased without alerting financial institutions.
2. **Account Management**: Users have full control over which accounts to close and when, simplifying the estate settlement process.
3. **Integration with Major Institutions**: Sunset partners with banks, insurance companies, and retirement funds to streamline the asset closure and transfer process.

**User Experience**

Sunset’s service is currently free for asset searches, charging a fee based on the interest generated in the estate account once accounts are selected for closure. This model lowers the barrier to entry for families facing the challenges of estate management.

Customer feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, with families praising the platform for its clarity, ease of use, and significant time-saving benefits. Users have shared that Sunset simplifies what can be a daunting experience, allowing them to focus on what truly matters during difficult times. 

**Key Features & Benefits**
- **Comprehensive Asset Tracking**: Sunset locates bank accounts, credit cards, life insurance, and property holdings.
- **Privacy Compliance**: The platform adheres to stringent security standards, ensuring user data is protected.
- **Control Over Process**: Families dictate which accounts to close and when, without any rush.
- **Dedicated Support**: A customer support team is on standby to assist users throughout the process.

**Looking Forward**

Sunset is not just filling a gap in the market; it's recalibrating what families can expect from financial services during life’s toughest moments. By merging fintech solutions with a compassionate approach to consumer finance, Sunset stands out in the burgeoning area of death care services.

**Explore More**: For additional insights or to get started, visit [Sunset's website](https://www.sunsetapp.com/).
